nodes.text: The Ruusan system was a star system located in the Teraab sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Ruusan, and was located at square P-11 on the Standard Galactic Grid. During the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, one of the planet's three moons was the site of Skytop Station, a secret Separatist listening post. At another point during the conflict, Separatist and Republic forces fought a battle in the system, with the wreckage of several starships involved remaining in the system until well into the Imperial Era.
